generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the curb.
- building: Buildings are visible in the background on both sides of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the roadside and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings.
- car: A white car is visible driving on the road.
- pole: Poles are visible along the road, supporting signs and possibly traffic lights.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign indicating a speed limit of 40 is visible on the left side of the road.
- fence: A fence is visible along the left side of the road, separating the road from a wooded area.
